overview: Iskandar Muhammad the son of a farmer who is ambitious to become a pilot. After graduation, he was recruited Air Force as a Lieutenant.  While in college, he met with Redzua Mazlan, the son of a retired Air Force general who lived socializing. Friendship among those who were initially close suddenly loosened by misunderstandings arising from captivating Redzua Aini's first cousin Iskandar. Then reconcile after a single incident where Alexander was almost captured by a group of terrorists who had escaped from the RMAF air strikes.
title: Wira Angkasa
